introduction: In pursuit of London’s most notorious killers.It’s up to the detectives at New Scotland Yard to investigate the most mysterious and gripping murders in London. And now they're opening their case files to tell the inside story of how they outsmarted the capital's most notorious killers.Weaving together in-depth interviews and evocative reconstructions, the gripping true crime documentary series takes viewers through every twist and turn of the investigation, revealing just what it takes to uncover the truth.Presented by insider and former NSY detective Peter Bleksley, New Scotland Yard also showcases the journalists who covered the stories, the criminologists who analysed the killers’ motives and methods, and the forensic experts who came up with the evidence that ultimately blew the case wide open.Producer(s):ITN PRODUCTIONS
